doc:
Penny Fuller https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penny_Fuller 0 Penelope Ann "Penny" Fuller (born July 21, 1940) is an American actress. She received two Tony Award nominations for her performances on Broadway stage: for Applause (1970), and The Dinner Party (2001). For her television performances, Fuller received six Emmy Award nominations, winning once, in 1982 for playing Madge Kendal in The Elephant Man. Penelope_Ann_"_Penny_"_Fuller ( born July_21_,_1940 ) is an_American_actress . She received two_Tony_Award_nominations for her_performances on Broadway_stage : for Applause_(_1970_) , and The_Dinner_Party_(_2001_) . For her_television_performances , Fuller received six_Emmy_Award_nominations , winning once , in 1982 for playing Madge_Kendal in The_Elephant_Man .
